statements: UPDATE escrow_details SET deposit_amount = 2000.50, funds_status = TRUE WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE escrow_details SET buyer_name = 'John Doe', contract_conditions = 'To be inspected' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE escrow_details SET deposit_amount = 5000.00, funds_status = true, contract_conditions = 'No contingencies' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE escrow_details SET buyer_name = 'John Doe', seller_name = 'Jane Smith', contract_conditions = 'Subject to inspection' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE real_estate_transactions SET transaction_amount = 250000.00 WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE escrow_accounts SET account_balance = 75000.00 WHERE account_id = 98765;
UPDATE real_estate_transactions SET transaction_amount = 150000.00, seller_name = 'John Doe' WHERE transaction_id = 101
UPDATE escrow_accounts SET account_balance = 50000.75 WHERE account_id = 202
UPDATE real_estate_escrow_details SET escrow_status = 'completed' WHERE escrow_id = 12345;
UPDATE transactions_funds SET amount = 50000, transaction_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE transaction_id = 98765;
UPDATE real_estate_escrow_details SET escrow_status = 'completed', payment_received = TRUE WHERE escrow_id = 123456;
UPDATE transactions_funds SET amount = amount - 500 WHERE transaction_id = 789012;
UPDATE real_estate_transactions SET escrow_amount = 7500.45, buyer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE escrow_details SET escrow_status = 'Completed', funds_amount = 5000.00 WHERE transaction_id = 2;

UPDATE buyers SET email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE buyer_name = 'John Doe'

UPDATE escrow_documents SET document_name = 'Purchase Agreement', document_type = 'Legal', document_url = 'https://example.com/purchase_agreement' WHERE document_id = '456e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
